title: Hopesfall Discography @ 256kbps
description:
Here is the complete discography from [b].hopesfall.[/b]

Every album has been ripped from store bought copies I own and have been encoded at 256kbps VBR with exception of the two B sides, "Bird Flu" and "Eye," which are encoded at 192kbps. There are no scratches/skips.

The details are as follows:

[b]The Frailty of Words[/b] (1999)

1. Shines Through
2. In Reflection
3. Endeavor
4. Lament
5. From Your Hands
6. Comfort
7. A Winter&#039;s Rose
8. A New Day
9. The Frailty of Words
10. The Broken Heart of a Traitor

[b]No Wings to Speak of [/b](2002)

1. Open Hands To The Wind
2. April Left With Silence
3. The End Of An Era
4. The Far Pavilions

[b]A Types[/b] (2004)

1. It Happens
2. Start and Pause
3. Icarus
4. Breathe From Coma
5. Champion Beyond Blessing
6. The Ones
7. Manipulate the Eclipse
8. Matchmaker&#039;s Haven
9. Owl
10. Per Sempre Marciamo

[b]Magnetic North[/b] (2007)

1. Rx Contender The Pretender
2. Swamp Kittens
3. Cubic Zirkonias Are Forever
4. I Can Do This On An Island
5. Secondhand Surgery
6. Vacation/ Add/ Vacation!
7. Magnetic North
8. East Of 1989; Battle Of The Bay
9. Bird Flu
10. The Canon
11. Devil&#039;s Concubine
12. Head General Hospital
13. Paisley

I have also included a different version of "Bird Flu" which first appeared on the compilation "Trustkill Takeover, Vol. 2" and a cover of "Eye" from "The Killer in You: A Tribute to Smashing Pumpkins."

Enjoy!
